tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_designer_data (
    designer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50),
    design_sketches TEXT,
    inspiration_images TEXT,
    fabric_swatches TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE FashionDesignersDesigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    design_sketches TEXT,
    inspiration_images TEXT,
    fabric_swatches TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DesignersNotes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_id INT,
    note_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    note_content TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES FashionDesignersDesigns(id)
);

CREATE TABLE FabricSwatches (
  swatch_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  swatch_material VARCHAR(50),
  swatch_color VARCHAR(30),
  swatch_image BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE designer_sketches (
    sketch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50),
    sketch_title VARCHAR(100),
    sketch_date DATE,
    sketch_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inspiration_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50),
    image_title VARCHAR(100),
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    image_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE fabric_swatches (
    swatch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(50),
    swatch_name VARCHAR(50),
    swatch_type VARCHAR(50),
    swatch_color VARCHAR(50),
    swatch_material VARCHAR(50),
    swatch_image_url VARCHAR(255)
);
